utterly worthless in any philosophical 
sense. It may be taken, as
descriptive of certain appearances 
observed by the author in the 
substance of the muscle in 
“measly pork” - but the 
explanation of these appearances 
& the “theoretical considerations”
as they are termed, connected 
with them, are to my mind 
opposed to all reason &
probability, as well as, so
inconsistent with well 
known facts, as to render 
their promulgation under
